name: Iced Coffee
description: Our specially brewed coffee served over ice for a refreshing and bold coffee taste.

name: White Chocolate
description: Our perfectly roasted coffees are blended with our powders, steamed non-fat milk and topped with thick foam to create a delicious pick-me-up treat.

name: Brewed Coffee
description: Freshly pulled shots of espresso combined with hot water.

name: Americano
description: One of our light, medium, dark, decaffeinated, or flavored brews of the day, brewed from only the top 1% of Arabica beans in the world.

name: Cappucino
description: A freshly pulled shot of espresso layered with steamed whole milk and thick rich foam to offer a luxurious velvety texture and complex aroma.

name: Espresso
description: Perfectly balanced with a golden crema, this intense espresso has a caramel like aroma, velvety body, earthy flavor and a bittersweet finish.

name: Caramel Ice Blended
description: A sweet treat made from our delicious fresh espresso, signature powders, and milk is blended with ice then topped with whipped cream.

name: Hazelnut Pure Ice Blended
description: Non-fat milk blended with our signature powders and ice and then topped with whipped cream. A delicious non-caffeinated treat.

name: Salted Toffee Ice Blended
description: Our signature espresso blended with rich, buttery toffee flavor and salty notes of our new Salted Toffee sauce to create a delicious indulgence.

name: Black Tea
description: Like green and oolong teas, black tea comes from the Camellia sinensis plant. Its darker hue and stronger taste result from the greater level of oxidation it undergoes during processing. From delicate Darjeeling to strong Ceylon, each variety has distinct characteristics, making black tea a beloved beverage across the globe.

name: Iced Tea Latte
description: A delicious blend of freshly pulled shots of concentrated tea leaves combined with our French Deluxe™ Vanilla powder over ice.

name: Chai Tea Latte
description: A delicious blend of freshly pulled shots of concentrated tea leaves combined with steamed milk and our French Deluxe™ vanilla powder.

name: Veranda Blend
description: In Latin America, coffee farms are often run by families, with their own homes on the same land where their coffee grows. We’ve sipped coffee with these farmers for decades, sitting on their verandas, overlooking the lush beauty of the coffee trees rolling out in the distance. Most times it was a lightly roasted coffee like this one. It took us more than 80 tries to get it right—mellow and flavorful with a nice softness.

name: Blonde Espresso Roast
description: Experience the lighter side of espresso—a soft, beautifully balanced flavor profile that pairs perfectly with milk (or your favorite nondairy alternative). Made up of select Latin American and East African beans, this blend is carefully roasted to coax out sweet, vibrant notes of candied apple and bittersweet chocolate. The result is smooth, well-rounded and versatile, delicious served hot or over ice.

name: Holiday Blend
description: Crafted with joyful celebrations in mind, Cafesa's Holiday Blend offers a balanced, sweet and toasty alchemy of bright Latin American beans with rich Sumatran coffee. Expertly roasted to highlight flavor nuances, each sip is full-bodied and vibrant. Layered notes of sweet maple and herbs balance the rich flavors of this celebratory cup.

name: Italian Roast
description: This is Cafesa's quintessential dark roast—expertly crafted to bring out sweetness and intensity. It showcases the precision and skill of our roasters, who created a coffee slightly darker than our Espresso Roast without the smoky edge of French Roast. A great cup of coffee with enriched flavor.

name: Sumatra
description: Grown on a lush Indonesian island, this spicy coffee is truly one of a kind. We fell in love with Sumatran coffee in 1971, and it’s been one of our most treasured offerings ever since. The taste is distinctive and unmistakable—strikingly bold and full-bodied with rich herbals, rustic spice notes and a muted acidity.

name: Autumn Blend
description: Immerse yourself in the essence of fall with these captivating speckled stainless mugs.

name: Mug Pack
description: Upgrade your iced coffee game with colorful silicone cups perfect for beach days and getaways. BPA-free. Hand wash.

name: Black Mug
description: Warm colors and gold textures make your morning coffee routine that much richer.

name: Carton Cup
description: Enjoy your favorite hot beverage on a cool winter morning with our 20 fl oz stainless-steel tumbler in rich copper.

name: Mug With a Plate
description: Your desk will appreciate the silicone base and splash- resistant lid on our crisp white ceramic desktop mug.

name: Thermos
description: Your desk will appreciate the silicone base and splash- resistant lid on our crisp white ceramic desktop mug.

name: Blue Mug
description: Your desk will appreciate the silicone base and splash- resistant lid on our crisp white ceramic desktop mug.
